name: Moroccan Tiles
prompt: A VibeDeck controller covered in traditional Moroccan zellige tile patterns. Intricate geometric mosaics in cobalt blue, white, and gold. Hand-cut tile pieces forming star and flower patterns. The rotary knob is a decorative brass fixture. Buttons are individual mosaic sections. Islamic geometric art patterns. The body has the texture of glazed ceramic tiles. Warm North African lighting, perhaps in a riad courtyard setting.
why: Artisan craft, cultural beauty, intricate detail
